meta.title: Spartanburg County School District One News Article

meta.content: FREE MEALS for children during school closure

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.div: Physical Address: 121 Wheeler Street Campobello, SC 29322 | Phone: (864) 472-2846 | Fax: (864) 472-4118

img.style: font-family: noto sans; width: 31px; vertical-align: middle; padding-right: 10px; padding: 8px; border-left: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12); border-right: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12);

div.span: FREE MEALS for children during school closure

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Trebuchet MS"; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Trebuchet MS"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: One will be offering FREE MEALS to all children 18 years and under via curbside pickup and bus delivery. Chapman High School and Landrum High School will have meals available for pickup at the rear entrances Monday-Friday from 8:30 - 11:30 A.M. during school closure.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Trebuchet MS"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Buses will also run regular morning routes to deliver meals to students each day during school closure.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Trebuchet MS"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: If you have a child who needs meals and is not a morning bus rider and you cannot make it to a designated school pickup location, please call our district office at 864.472.2846 so that other arrangements can be made.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Trebuchet MS"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We will continue to provide updates throughout the week as we implement additional procedures.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Trebuchet MS"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

div.span: Mailing Address: PO Box 218 | Campobello, SC 29322

br.span: Physical Address: 121 Wheeler Street | Campobello, SC 29322
